name: Gabriele Gramelsberger
title: Prof. Dr. phil.
cv: Dr. Gabriele Gramelsberger holds the Chair in Theory of Science and Technology. Together with Dr. Stefan Böschen (Chair in Technology and Society) she is responsible for the Master Programme „Governance of Technology and Innovation.“ In 2018 she founded the CSS-Lab supported by the NRW Digital Fellowship 2017. Her aim is to develop a conceptual framework for Philosophy of Computational Scienes as well as an open science infrastructure for Computational Science Studies. She is a member of the RWTH Human Technology Center and she is Vice-Dean for Research of the Faculty of Arts and Humanities at the RWTH Aachen University. In 2018 the DFG appointed her as a member of the Allianz-Initiative „Digitale Information.“
